attributes.action: Write off all debt in relation to the inland revenue's miscalculations of family tax credits.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Honest working families are being hounded by the IRS for repayment of family tax credits which have been miscalculated by them. This is a massive problem, the IRS/government should accept responsability for their errors and write off all outstanding debt and repay what they have already reclaimed from working families. This situation amounts to gross misconduct on the part of the IRS and is inexcusable.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
